actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to revise and extend the community education program, and for other purposes.
short_title: Community Schools and Comprehensive Community Education Act
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Community Schools and Comprehensive Community Education Act - Authorizes the Commissioner of Education to make grants to State and local educational agencies to pay the Federal share of establishing community education programs. Defines "community education program" as a program operated by a local educational agency providing educational, recreational, health care, cultural, and other related services for the community. Establishes a Community Education Advisory Council to advise the National Institute of Education concerning community education programs.

titles.title: Community Schools and Comprehensive Community Education Act
A bill to revise and extend the community education program, and for other purposes.
